name: Expansion VR
description:
Expansion is an immersive VR real-time tactical strategy with an adventurous spirit. Its gameplay seamlessly combines action, exploration, and decision-making, challenging the limits of your intelligence and your ability to maneuver effectively. Take command of your high-tech base, elite battle squads, and ferocious units in intense warfare.



In a future where humanity has solved age-old problems like hunger and war (ah, war… at least we thought so), we didn't just stop at recycling cans; we recycled everything. We even leveled mountains and drained oceans to fuel our insatiable need for progress. Heck, we took a chunk out of the Moon—talk about overreaching! The aftermath? An unbalanced world, with natural cataclysms serving as a harsh reality check.

Prepare for an epic quest that spans from Earth's altered landscapes to newly colonized celestial realms. Discover the hidden costs and lurking dangers of a civilization that might have gotten a little too good at playing god. This is a world where the enemy isn't just some villain but perhaps humanity's unchecked ambition itself.


Unleash a diverse range of strategies and tactics, fostering creativity and complexity in every battle. Gather and oversee essential resources to amplify your influence and dominance. Discover, unlock, and nurture a wide array of units, each endowed with unique abilities and advantages. Say goodbye to monotony and repetitiveness.




Lead the Privateers, skilled mercenaries with a penchant for long-range combat, the Miners, versatile pioneers blending mining expertise with battle-hardened skills, and the relentless Pigdogs, powerful and numerous. Each race brings a unique strategic element to the battlefield, shaping the warfare theater.



Clash with opponents in live online matches that demand skill, timing, and strategy. Join the ongoing fight for supremacy and influence, determining the balance of power within the game world.
